title: School of Veterinary Medicine and Biomedical Sciences
cleaned_text: The School of Veterinary Medicine and Biomedical Sciences (SVMBS) is proud to be Nebraska's leading institution for education, research, extension and outreach related to veterinary medicine and veterinary science.
